mandatory_terms: Instructions: Controller's instructions for processing; Nature and Purpose: Nature purpose and duration of processing; Data Types: Type of personal data and categories of data subjects; Obligations: Controller's and processor's obligations and rights; Return/Deletion: Procedures for return or deletion of personal data upon completion of services or termination of agreement; Confidentiality: Confidentiality commitments of persons authorized to process personal data; Security: Appropriate technical and organizational security measures; Assistance: Processor assistance with controller's obligations to respond to consumer rights requests; DPA Support: Processor assistance with controller's Data Protection Assessment obligations; Audits: Controller's right to take reasonable steps to ensure processor is meeting obligations including right to audit; Subprocessors: Subcontractor requirements binding subcontractors to same obligations as processor
